label: AI Impact on Education
rationale: This component reflects perceptions of the significance and applicability of AI techniques in enhancing educational research and practices.

label: AI Integration in Education
rationale: This component reflects the ability to utilize AI tools for enhancing understanding and resource discovery in the educational context.

label: AI Fairness Awareness
rationale: This component reflects the importance of understanding AI fairness and biases in educational contexts, influencing the likelihood of using AI tools based on their transparency and fairness evaluations.
